SEARCH
Package org.example.gui.pages.main

Class EditButtonListener

java.lang.Object
org.example.gui.pages.main.EditButtonListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class EditButtonListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Listener for handling edit button functionality for editing and saving course data.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private JButton
    button
    JButton used to toggle between edit and save modes for the course data.

    data
    Two-dimensional array containing course data for all grade levels.

    gradeData
    Array representing the grade data for a specific grade level.
    private boolean
    isEditing
    Flag indicating whether the application is in edit mode.
    private String
    username
    Username of the user associated with the course data being edited.

  • Field Details

    • gradeData

      private String[] gradeData
      Array representing the grade data for a specific grade level. Contains the grade and associated course information.

    • courseName

      private JComboBox[] courseName
      Array of JComboBox components for selecting course names. Each JComboBox corresponds to a course slot in the grade data.

    • button

      private JButton button
      JButton used to toggle between edit and save modes for the course data.

    • isEditing

      private boolean isEditing
      Flag indicating whether the application is in edit mode. Set to true when editing is active, and false when saving is active.

    • username

      private String username
      Username of the user associated with the course data being edited.

    • data

      private String[][] data
      Two-dimensional array containing course data for all grade levels. Each row corresponds to a grade level, and columns contain course information.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditButtonListener

      public EditButtonListener(String[] gradeData, JComboBox<String>[] courseName, JButton button, String username, String[][] data)
      Constructor to initialize the EditButtonListener with required parameters.
      Parameters:
      gradeData - Array representing the grade data for a specific grade level.
      courseName - Array of JComboBoxes for course names to be edited.
      button - JButton for toggling between edit and save modes.
      username - Username associated with the course data.
      data - Two-dimensional array containing course data for all grades.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      Handles the action event triggered by the edit button.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - ActionEvent representing the button click.

    • hasDuplicates

      private boolean hasDuplicates(String[] courses, JComboBox<String>[] comboBoxes)
      Checks for duplicate courses in the selected list and highlights duplicates.
      Parameters:
      courses - Array of selected courses.
      comboBoxes - Array of JComboBoxes to update background color for duplicates.
      Returns:
      true if duplicates are found, false otherwise.

    • resetComboBoxBackgrounds

      private void resetComboBoxBackgrounds(JComboBox<String>[] comboBoxes)
      Resets the background colors of all JComboBoxes to the default color.
      Parameters:
      comboBoxes - Array of JComboBoxes to reset.

    • lightenColor

      private Color lightenColor(Color color, float factor)
      Lightens the given color by a specified factor.
      Parameters:
      color - Original color to lighten.
      factor - Float factor to lighten the color (0.0 - 1.0).
      Returns:
      Lightened color.

    • writeRecommendedCoursesToFile

      public static void writeRecommendedCoursesToFile(String[][] data, String username)
      Writes the updated course data to a JSON file for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      data - Two-dimensional array containing course data for all grades.
      username - Username associated with the course data.
